job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Contract to Hire - $80 - $100 / hour DOE Client is looking to bring in a Machine Learning resource to help with 3 major projects. Need to have a mixture of Programming, Data Engineering/Structures, Probability/Statistics background. Skill Set Required Large project experience with Machine Learning Programming Skills - C / C++ / R / Java / Python Data Engineering/Data Structure experience/knowledge Machine Learning Algorithms/Libraries Consutling background is highly preffered Other Data I Pulled from ML Skill Sets / Resumes Data Visualization Predictive Analysis Statistical Modeling Data Mining Clustering & Classification Data Analytics Quantitative Analysis Web Scraping Model Development
